message: Let's make a deal! I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a good offer considering the inflation, think about it!
I'm offering a 55/45 split in my favor. It's a fair deal considering the inflation, and I think it's more equitable than your previous proposal.  Let's end this game on a good note.
Bob, time is running out and the money keeps shrinking! My last offer was already generous, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's split it 58/42 and call it a day.
